Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/Hoyne
ShortDescription: Eastbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Western, 51st, Ashland and 47th, over normal route, due to street blockage near 47th/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Western, 51st, Ashland and 47th, over normal route, due to street blockage near 47th/Hoyne.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
